title: Jhin's got a symbol on his gun

replies.body: Clearly he drinks Monster Energy.
He drinks what {{champion:35}} drinks.

> [{quoted}](name=Baron Von Bangin,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=RuBXeM4g,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-01-06T22:16:25.426+0000)
>
> Clearly he drinks Monster Energy.

oooOOoooOOoo product tie in?
Would have 3 lines then.
Riot said no 3 hit passive, must be 4 hit passive confirmed.
Well, it appears you were right, my friend
The guns kind of remind me of Lucian's.
Ikr, Saw the trailer and thought "great, ANOTHER champ with magic guns..."
Adding to the only one we have rather than making another with ordinary guns..?

He's not an ADC, He's a Bullet Mage :3

He Practices Ballistimancy

I'm actually hoping he's a mage. Seems a bit of a stretch since he has a gun that generally means ADC, but I think a mage that uses a gun would be an interesting twist. Plus with how it almost looks like he's using spells when he fires, it wouldn't be too unlikely.

Surprise twist!
He's actually a support shooting his allies.
Hell I'd play that.
Hell I do play that over in SWtoR ;).

Tried that game. Got annoyed when it started taking a few hours to grind out a single level.
I quit when it said it would start cutting my exp gain in half [again] because I wasn't a subscriber.

Shame, The story was getting interesting. But if I have to grind for days between each segment; it's not worth it.
They would cut exp in half?  That's stupid.

Problem with WoW clones: The grinding.
Problem with EA: Monetary obsession at the expense of customers.
Problem with SWtOR: A WoW clone published by EA.

Yeah, I relished choosing my smuggler character (a long time ago, the skill tree was certainly different than what it is now) and I made him go invisible....SOOOOOO many enemies I could now just sneak by. It was liberating.

I went imperial sniper.
Go around solo. 3-shot mini-bosses.
Join group for exp bonus. Still took 4-5 hours to level up. Need 4 more levels before I could do the next story quest.

Pass.

Wut? Never had a problem doing story quests until my 3rd playthrough as a Sith Juggernaut. With him I suddenly found myself 3 or 4 levels behind and unable to do much. Everyone else leveled fine. Though it was a hell of a pain doing all the stupid missions each planet, including the "Oh look, you're done with the main story missions, but here! Have 30 more quests to do on this planet." missions. Side quests are even worse.

Yeah....trying to go through the sidequests to stay at a proper level is brutal. That's why I've been trying to grab a group of friends to play with me, so I at least have some banter to try and work with. Can never seem to coordinate it properly though.
My problem wasn't doing the story quests once they were unlocked. My problem was how long it took to unlock the damn things.
"Gun Kata"

Magneto as champ confirmed.

Hard counters Blitzcrank and Viktor
well it had a hole in it and seemed like it fired a bullet instead of box shaped laser shooting ones lucian has
"Another" as if we had that many :p we heb several of certain other types so its fine
Gotta make a white guy with guns so rito doesn't get stamped with stereotypical label with {{champion:236}} having a drive by tickling ability :|
Jokes on you, he's actually Hispanic so Riot can double down on it and have a racial gang war between five Jhin's and five Lucian's next time One For All comes around.
{{champion:236}}  doesn't have guns he has hi-tech toasters.
Magical toasters.
Wonder if it's the continuation of the mysterious series containing champs with roman numerals somewhere on them. Could this be another?

The only champ I remember with roman numerals is Vi (6).

Also, even if that symbol WAS supposed to be a roman numeral, the sign for four is IV
Youre right.  Actually a bunch of Piltover and Zain champs use roman numerials.  And he doesnt have a IV on his gun....
if you look at the roman numerals on clocks however.. IIII is used for 4.... It's used to maintain the symmetry of the shape... maintaining... Perfection as you will

> [{quoted}](name=Sythriel Draken,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=RuBXeM4g,comment-id=0009000000020002,timestamp=2016-01-08T04:33:41.608+0000)
>
> if you look at the roman numerals on clocks however.. IIII is used for 4.... It's used to maintain the symmetry of the shape... maintaining... Perfection as you will

I dunno what clocks you're looking at but I've never seen one that uses that symbol for 4.
They just use IV
Do a google search for clocks with roman numerals.. you'll see what I mean.
Is that a reference to Jarvan IIII? :^)
There are a couple others, with like {{champion:245}}  and the roman numeral on his sword.

> [{quoted}](name=zangager,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=RuBXeM4g,comment-id=000900000000,timestamp=2016-01-07T06:36:05.181+0000)
>
> There are a couple others, with like {{champion:245}}  and the roman numeral on his sword.

That's because it's literally part of a clock he ripped off. Its not an actual sword.

{{champion:254}}  is 6
{{champion:222}}  was considered 10
{{champion:245}} i believe is 3

so its not far of a stretch he might be number 4 though unlikely as he looks like he is from Ionia and not Zaun unless he is kinda like Sona in a way... Ionia born but works out of Zaun.

{{champion:51}} Is C, C=100
{{champion:254}}  Is VI, VI=6
{{champion:245}}  Is XII, XII=12
{{champion:222}} Is X, X=10...

not sure where you got that Ekko was 3...his club literally has XII on it.

> [{quoted}](name=Zyorhist,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=RuBXeM4g,comment-id=000900000000000000000001,timestamp=2016-01-07T16:05:47.597+0000)
>
> {{champion:51}} Is C, C=100
> {{champion:254}}  Is VI, VI=6
> {{champion:245}}  Is XII, XII=12
> {{champion:222}} Is X, X=10...
> 
> not sure where you got that Ekko was 3...his club literally has XII on it.

caitlyn isnt C, the thief is C, or at least his/her calling card is C
I know watches usually use IIII as roman for 4. However the actual symbol for number 4 is IV
IV and IIII are both valid roman numerals for 4.

Today its up to interpretation.
But its not so in Latin, which is where the "roman 4" is from. Romans used to speak...... you know...... latin
4 hit proc confirmed

https://youtu.be/Q_2G943xRbI

Sorry I had too

Dum, dum, dum, honey what have you done?
Dum, dum, dum it's the sound of my gun.
Dum, dum, dum, honey what have you done?
Dum, dum, dum it's the sound

Jhinie's got a gun

You know this may be a crazy thought, but bare with me.  I don't think its a 4-hit passive, one of the reasons being that Riot believes 3-hit passives are the balanced way to go.  I actually believe that it might be hinting at him having a kit like {{champion:77}}, meaning no ult, but 4 skills that act like stances.
That would be epic on a marskman
